fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.batteries.mil

Class BatteriesUnitTesterModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.utils.tests.AbstractTestScenarioBasedAtomicHIOA
            • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.batteries.mil.BatteriesUnitTesterModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BatteriesUserI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableDefinitionsAndSharingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableInitialisationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.AtomicModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.EventsExchangingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, java.io.Serializable

    @ModelExternalEvents(imported={BatteriesEmpty.class,BatteriesAvailable.class},
                     exported={StartCharging.class,StopCharging.class,BatteriesRequiredPowerChanged.class})
 @ModelImportedVariable(name="batteriesInputPower",type=java.lang.Double.class) @ModelImportedVariable(name="batteriesOutputPower",type=java.lang.Double.class)
 @ModelExportedVariable(name="batteriesRequiredPower",
                       type=java.lang.Double.class)
public class BatteriesUnitTesterModel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.utils.tests.AbstractTestScenarioBasedAtomicHIOA
implements BatteriesUserI
    The class BatteriesUnitTesterModel implements a model that executes test scenarios for the batteries.

    Description

    This atomic HIOA simulation model is defined as solely executing test scenarios (@see fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025.tests_utils.AbstractTestScenarioBasedAtomicHIOA) for more explanations.

    • Imported events: BatteriesEmpty, BatteriesAvailable
    • Exported events: StartCharging, StopCharging, BatteriesRequiredPowerChanged
    • Imported variables:
      • name = batteriesInputPower, type = Double
      • name = batteriesOutputPower, type = Double
    • Exported variables: name = batteriesRequiredPower, type = Double

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2025-10-13

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      protected fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.Value<java.lang.Double> batteriesInputPower
      power consumed from the electric circuit to charge the batteries in MeasurementUnit.AMPERES.
      protected fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.Value<java.lang.Double> batteriesOutputPower
      power delivered to the electric circuit by the batteries in MeasurementUnit.AMPERES.
      protected fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.Value<java.lang.Double> batteriesRequiredPower

    • Constructor Detail

      • BatteriesUnitTesterModel

        public BatteriesUnitTesterModel(java.lang.String uri,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit,
                                fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.AtomicSimulatorI simulationEngine)
        create an atomic hybrid input/output model with the given URI (if null, one will be generated) and to be run by the given simulator using the given time unit for its clock.

        Contract

         pre     uri == null || !uri.isEmpty()
 pre     simulatedTimeUnit != null
 pre     simulationEngine != null && !simulationEngine.isModelSet()
 pre     simulationEngine instanceof AtomicEngine
 post    !isDebugModeOn()
 post    getURI() != null && !getURI().isEmpty()
 post    uri == null || getURI().equals(uri)
 post    getSimulatedTimeUnit().equals(simulatedTimeUnit)
 post    getSimulationEngine().equals(simulationEngine)
        Parameters:
        uri - unique identifier of the model.
        simulatedTimeUnit - time unit used for the simulation clock.
        simulationEngine - simulation engine enacting the model.
